name: Pine Ridge Boxing
description:
Pine Ridge Boxing The Game is a fighting game based on the Pine Ridge Boxing animated movies.

Select your character and fight alongside or against your friends and/or random people in an online multiplayer brawl!

This game is cross-platform compatible with Windows and Android devices

Keyboard Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys

Run: Shift

Light Attack: C

Heavy Attack: X

Dodge: Z

Technique: V

Block: B

Open Chat: Tab

Send Message in Chat: Enter

It is recommended you use a controller for this game (Note: for basic things like browsing the menus and typing in the chat, you will have to use your keyboard)

XInput Controllers are preferred as DInput controllers are known to possibly cause some issues in games made with Game Maker Studio

The Android version of the app has its own on-screen buttons in place

Known Issues:

  • [Windows] The game sometimes gets out of fullscreen mode whenever a URL is opened.
    • You can go back to the Options Menu and enable fullscreen there or you can just press F4
  • [Windows] Green block covering the screen
    • Restart the game to fix this
    • The green block is actually just an oversized healthbar
  • [Mac] "App is damaged and can't be opened" error message
    • This is due to Apple's restrictions on apps downloaded from outside the app store
    • Open up the Terminal app and paste in the following text and then press enter: sudo spctl --master-disable It should ask for your password so just type that in and then press enter again. The game should be working now
  • [Android] When you type in your password, it only shows two characters in the password box.
    • You should be able to still log in regardless of what it shows in the password box.
  • [Android] Backgrounds aren't animated like on the Windows version of the game (Except for the main menu background).
    • The game runs at 60fps and since Android is a much inferior platform to Windows, the game would suffer huge slowdowns when the backgrounds are animated.
  • [Android] Sometimes the on-screen buttons won't work
    • Restarting the game should fix this issue.
    • Before going into a public match, go into the training room to check and see if the buttons are working.
